You are not "Most of the community." I have not talked to one person who considers Mordekeiser a healthy champion anymore, mainly because he's so incredibly broken that if you nerf him he becomes useless and if you buff him he becomes completely overpowered. You act like having perma ban status is a GOOD thing, when in fact, it is not in the slightest. Personally, I loved Mordekeiser before he was reworked. Playing him was a blast, and he was just becoming one of my mains. Then they said we're reworking him and since then I haven't played him because I don't want to forget the old Mordekeiser feeling, and not to mention the fact that I don't enjoy going bot lane be it support or ADC.
